items.description: FeatureGateDescription is a golang-only interface used to contains details for a feature gate.

name.description: name is the name of the FeatureGate.

OwningJiraComponent.description: OwningJiraComponent is the jira component that owns most of the impl and first assignment for the bug. This is the team that owns the feature long term.

OwningProduct.description: OwningProduct is the product that owns the lifecycle of the gate.

ResponsiblePerson.description: ResponsiblePerson is the person who is on the hook for first contact.  This is often, but not always, a team lead. It is someone who can make the promise on the behalf of the team.
